item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Llama 3.1 405B now runs at 969 tokens/s on Cerebras Inference (220 points | 67 comments)
2. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (402 points | 224 comments)
3. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (79 points | 13 comments)
4. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (275 points | 73 comments)
5. 20 years of Google Scholar (239 points | 118 comments)
6. Sequin: A powerful little tool for inspecting ANSI escape sequences (28 points | 4 comments)
7. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (197 points | 68 comments)
8. Rats Learned to Drive–and They Love It (105 points | 34 comments)
9. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (71 points | 3 comments)
10. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (233 points | 96 comments)
11. Hyrumtoken: A Go package to encrypt pagination tokens (31 points | 6 comments)
12. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (200 points | 195 comments)
13. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (206 points | 393 comments)
14. Retro beige PC case goes from April Fools' joke to retail (16 points | 2 comments)
15. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (164 points | 41 comments)
16. New textbook teaches students about matrix methods and their real world apps (11 points | 3 comments)
17. Histogramming Bytes with Positional Popcount (27 points | discuss)
18. Playful, intricate Japanese leaf art – in pictures – Art and design (30 points | discuss)
19. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (223 points | 53 comments)
20. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (239 points | 246 comments)
21. Reactive HTML Notebooks (318 points | 49 comments)
22. Iumenta: A generic framework for animal digital twins (3 points | discuss)
23. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (84 points | 19 comments)
24. Ask HN: Anybody used Retool for production, user-facing app? (20 points | 14 comments)
25. Trieve (YC W24) Is Hiring a software engineer to build OpenAPI tooling ( | hide)
26. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (103 points | 5 comments)
27. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (154 points | 26 comments)
28. Towards Nyquist Learners (57 points | 33 comments)
29. Against Best Practices (235 points | 184 comments)
30. JGS ASCII ART gallery (2001) (26 points | 2 comments)
